name: OG Arabian Prince
biography: Producer, DJ, technologist, Pro Gamer, Animator and Futurist, Founding member of the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame group N.W.A., producer of Grammy nominated #1 hit song Supersonic.

name: Scott Page
biography: He is currently on a mission of empowering artists and technologists to collectively elevate culture with THINK:NFT, an NFT ecosystem of top NFT talent and community events

name: Yat Siu
qualifications: Co-Founder and Executive Chairman, Animoca Brands
biography: Mr. Siu has been an early advocate for the use of blockchain and non-fungible tokens (NFTs) in the gaming industry, to allow gamers to enjoy true ownership of their game assets, data, and equity.

name: Balsam Danhach
biography: In July 2022, world leading Crypto Exchange FTX recieved full approval to operate a cryptocurrency exchange and clearing house in Dubai, for which Balsam Danhach is leading its intricate operation.

name: Valentine Blaze
qualifications: Founder & CEO of Crypto Ocean Corp.
biography: V-Blaze is the Co-founder and COO of The Metalunr decentralized Metaverse, a virtual world where players can create, play, own, govern and monetize their experiences.

name: Lennix lai
biography: Lennix leads the business strategy and operations for OKX internationally. With 15 years of experience in the world of crypto and financial services
